chapter.text: kaph-ha-ya-ain-sad
a tara palanaharani te krpanum varnana che je tene potana banda jhakariya (a.Sa.) Para kari hati
jyare tene potana palanaharani same ekantamam du'a kari
ke he mara palanahara! Mara hadaka nabala padi gaya che ane mathum vrd'dha vasthamam (valani saphedina) karane bhadaki gayum che, parantu hum kyareya tari same du'a kari nirasa nathi thayo
Mane mara mrtyu pachi potana sagasambandhi'ono bhaya che, mari patni pana vanjha che, basa tum mane tari pasethi varasadara apa
je maro pana varasadara bane ane yakuba a.Sa. Na kuntumbano pana nayaba bane ane mara palanahara, tum tene nikatano bando banavi le
he jhakariya! Ame tane eka balakani khusakhabara api'e chi'e, jenum nama yahya che, ame a pahela ko'ine tena jevum nama pana nathi apyum
jhakariya (a.Sa.) Kaheva lagya, he mara palanahara! Mare tyam balaka kevi rite thase, jyare ke mari patni vanjha ane hum pote vrdvavastha'e pahonci gayo chum
kahyum ke vacana avi ja rite tha'i gayum, tara palanahare kahi didhum che ke mara mate to a khuba ja sarala che ane mem tarum sarjana karyum, te pahela tame kami na hatam
kaheva lagya ke mara palanahara mara mate ko'i nisani nakki kari de, kahevamam avyum ke tara mate nisani e che ke, svastha hova chatam tame trana rato sudhi ko'i vyakti sathe vata nahim kari sako
have jhakariya (a.Sa.) Potani oradi manthi nikali, potani koma pase avi, temane isaro kare che ke tame savara-sanja allaha ta'alana namanum smarana karo
he yahya! Mari kitabane majabuta'ithi pakadi lo ane ame temane balapanathi ja samajadari api hati
ane potani pasethi daya ane pavitrata pana, te daravavalo hato
ane potana matapita sathe sadavartana karanaro hato, te vidrohi ane papi na hato
tena para salamati che, je divase te peda thayo ane je divase mrtyu pamase ane je divase te jivita kari uthavavamam avase
a kitabamam marayamana kis'sa num pana varnana karo, jyare te potana gharavala'othi alaga tha'i, pascima tarapha avi
Ane te loko tarapha parado kari lidho, pachi ame teni pase ruha (jibra'ila a.Sa.) Ne mokalya, basa! Te temani same sampurna vyakti bani pragata thaya
te (marayama) kaheva lagi, hum tarathi rahamananum sarana mangum chum jo tum thodoka pana allahathi daravavalo hoya
tene javaba apyo ke hum to allaha'e mokalelo sandesavahaka chum, tane eka pavitra balaka apava avyo chum
kaheva lagi, mare tyam balaka kevi rite tha'i sake che? Mane to ko'i manusyano hatha pana nathi adyo ane na to hum duracari chum

tene (jibra'ile) kahyum, vata to avi ja che, parantu tara palanaharanum kahevum che ke te mara mate khuba ja sarala che, ame to ane loko mate eka nisani banavisum. Ane potani khasa krpa, a to eka nakki thayeli vata che
basa! Te garbhavati tha'i ga'i ane ana ja karane te durana sthale jati rahi
pachi pida tene eka khajurana vrksa nice la'i avi kahyum, kasa! Hum a pahela ja mrtyu pami hota ane lokoni yadathi pana bhula'i jati
etala manja tene nicethi pokaravamam avi ane kahyum ke nirasa na tha, tara palanahare tara paga nice eka jharanum vahavyum che
ane te khajurani daline potani tarapha halava, dali tara mate taji khajura padase
have santi thi kha ane pi ane ankho thandi rakha, jo tane ko'i vyakti male, to kahi de je ke mem dayalu allahana namano rojho rakhyo che, hum aje ko'i vyakti sathe vata nahim karum
have isa (a.Sa.)Ne la'i te potani koma samaksa avi, sau kaheva lagya, marayama tem ghanum adhama krtya karyum
he harunani bahena! Na to tara pita kharaba vyakti hatam ane na to tari mata duracari hati
Marayame potana balaka tarapha isaro karyo, sau kaheva lagya ke ju'o, ame a navajata balaka sathe vata kevi rite kari'e
balaka kaheva lagyum, ke hum allahano bando chum tene mane kitaba api ane mane potano payagambara banavyo
ane tene mane pavitra karyo che, jyam pana hum chum ane tene mane namajha ane jhakatano adesa apyo che jyam sudhi hum jivita rahum
ane tene mane potani matani seva karanara banavyo che ane mane vidrohi ane duracari nathi banavyo
ane mara para mara janma vakhate ane mara mrtyuna samaye ane te divase, ke jyare hum biji vara jivita karavamam avisa, salamati ja salamati che
a che satya kis'so marayamana putra isano, a ja che te satya vata jena vise loko sanka kare che
allaha ta'alane santana hovum asakya che, te to atyanta pavitra che, tene to jyare ko'i karya karavani iccha thaya che, to tene kahi de che ke tha'i ja, to te ja samaye te tha'i jaya che
maro ane tamara sauno palanahara phakta allaha che, tame sau teni ja bandagi karo, a ja satya marga che
pachi a jutho andaro'andara vivada karava lagya, basa! Inkara karanara'o mate â€œvailaâ€ che, eka mota divasani hajari vakhate
ketala jonara ane sambhalanara hase, te divase jyare amari samaksa hajara thase, parantu aje to a atyacari loko spasta rite pathabhrasta che
tame temane a hatasa ane nirasana divasana bhayani jana api do, jyare karyano nirnaya kari devamam avase ane a loko bedarakari ane inkaramam ja rahi jase
ame pote ja dharati ane dharatini dareka vastuna varasadara ho'isum ane dareka loko amari tarapha ja pacha pheravavamam avase
a kitabamam ibrahima (a.Sa.)Na kis'sanum varnana karo, ni:Sanka te'o atyanta saca payagambara hatam
Jyare te'o'e potana pitane kahyum ke, pitaji! Tame temani bandagi kema kari rahya cho je na sambhale na ju'e? Na tamane kami phayado pahoncadi sake
mara pitaji, tame ju'o mari pase evum jnana avyum che je tamari pase pahoncyum ja nathi, to tame marum ja mano, hum taddana satya marga tarapha tamane margadarsana apisa
mara pitaji! Tame setanani bandagi chodi do, setana to dayalu ane krpalu allahano avajnakara che
mara pitaji! Mane bhaya che ke kyanka tamara para allahano ko'i prakopa na avi pahonce ke tame setanana mitra bani java
tene javaba apyo ke, he ibrahima! Sum tum amara pujyoni avaganana kare che, sambhala! Jo tum cheto na rahyo to hum tane paththaro vade mari nakhisa, ja eka samayagala sudhi marathi alaga tha'i ja
kahyum ke, sarum tamara para salamati thaya, hum to mara palanahara same tamari maphini du'a karato rahisa te mara para ghano ja krpalu che

hum to tamane pana ane jemani pana tame allahane chodine bandagi karo cho temane pana, saune chodi rahyo chum, phakta potana palanaharane ja pokarato rahisa, mane asa che ke hum mara palanahara same du'a mangi, vancita nahim rahum
jyare ibrahima (a.Sa.) Te saune ane allaha sivayana temana dareka pujyone chodi cukya, to ame temane is'haka ane yakuba (a.Sa.) Apya. Ane bannene payagambara banavya
ane te saune ame potani ghani krpa api ane ame temana sara namone ucca kari didha
a kura'anamam musa a.Sa.Na kis'sanum varnana pana kara, je pasanda karela ane payagambara tatha nabi hatam
ame tene tura (parvatanum nama) ni jamani bajuthi pokarya ane bhedani vato janavata temane najika lavi didha
ane potani khasa krpa vade temana bha'ine payagambara banavya
A kura'anamam isma'ila a.Sa.Na kis'sanum pana varnana kara, te vacanana khuba ja saca hatam ane payagambara tatha nabi hatam
te potana gharavala'one satata namajha ane jhakatano adesa apata hatam ane potana palanaharani same pasandagi pamela ane man'ya pana hatam
ane a kitabamam idarisa a.Sa.Na kis'sanum pana varnana kara, te pana sadacari payagambara hatam
ame temane unca darajjavala banavi didha

a ja te payagambaro che jemana para allaha ta'ala'e krpa kari ane je'o adamana santana manthi che ane te lokona khanadana manthi che jemane ame nuha a.Sa.Ni sathe hodimam savara kari didha hatam. Ane ibrahima ane yakuba a.Sa.Ni santana manthi ane amara taraphathi satya marga upara ane amara nikatana loko manthi. Temani same jyare dayalu allahani ayato padhavamam avati to a loko radata radata sijadamam padi jata hatam
temana pachi eva vidrohi loko avya, ke te loko'e namajha chodi didhi ane maneccha'oni pachala padi gaya, to temanum nukasana temanathi agala avase
te loko sivaya, je'o tauba kari le ane imana lavi de ane satkaryo kare. Ava loko jannatamam pravesase ane temano thodoka pana adhikara jhuntavi levamam nahim ave
hammesavali jannatomam, jenum adrsya vacana krpalu allaha'e potana banda'one karyum che, ni:Sanka tenum vacana purum tha'ine ja rahese
te loko tyam ko'i nirarthaka vato nahim sambhale, phakta salama ja salama sambhalase, temana mate tyam savara-sanja temani roji hase
a che te jannata, jena varasadara ame amara banda'o manthi temane banavi'e chi'e, je'o dare che
ame tara palanaharana adesa vagara utari nathi sakata, amari agala-pachala ane temani vacceni sampurna vastu'o teni ja maliki hethalani che. Tamaro palanahara bhuli janara nathi

Akaso, dharati ane je kami pana te banne vacce che sauno palanahara te ja che, tame teni ja bandagi karo ane teni bandagi para adaga raho, sum tamara jnanamam tena jevum bijum nama tatha tena jevo bijo ko'i che
manavi kahe che ke, jyare hum mrtyu pamisa to sum phari jivita kari uthavavamam avisa
sum a manavi etalum pana yada nathi rakhato ke ame tenum sarjana a pahela karyum, jyare te kami pana na hato
tamara palanaharana soganda! Ame temane ane setanone bhega kari jarura jahannamani asa-pasa, ghuntane padela hajara karisum
ame pachi dareka jutha manthi temane cheta ubha kari da'isum, je'o dayalu allahathi ghana itara'ine calata hatam
pachi ame temane pana sari rite jani'e chi'e, je'o jahannamamam pravesa mate vadhare haka dharave che
tamara manthi dareka tyanthi jarura pasara thase, a tamara palanaharano atyanta sacota nirnaya che
pachi ame daravavala'one bacavi la'isum ane avajnakara lokone temam ja ghuntane padela chodi da'isum

jyare temani samaksa amari prakasita ayatonum varnana karavamam ave che to inkara karanara, musalamanone kahe che ke janavo, amara ane tamara jutha manthi kona pratisthita che ane koni sabha utkrsta che
ame to a pahela pana ghana juthone nasta kari cukya che, je samana tatha khyatimam temana karata vadhare hatam

kahi do je'o pathabhrasta hoya che, dayalu allaha tene ghani mahetala ape che, tyam sudhi ke te, te vastu'one jo'i le jenum vacana karavamam ave che, etale yatana athava kayamatane. Te samaye te loko satya jani lese ke kona kharaba che ane konum jutha asakta che
Ane satya margadarsanavala'one allaha ta'ala satya marga tarapha agala vadhare che ane baki rahevavala satkarmo tamara palanaharani najika valatara rupe ane parinama svarupe khuba ja uttama che
sum tame tene pana joyo, jene amari ayatono inkara karyo ane kahyum ke mane to dhana tatha santana jarurathi apavamam avase
sum te loko adrsyana jnanane jane che? Athava allaha pasethi ko'i vacana la'i lidhum che
kyareya nahim, a je kami pana kahi rahyo che ame tene jarura lakhi la'isum ane tena mate yatana vadharata rahisum
a je vastune kahi rahyo che, tene ame a pachi, pachi la'i la'isum ane a to taddana ekalo ja amari samaksa hajara thase
temane allaha sivaya bijane pujyo banavi rakhya che ke te temana mate ijajatanum karana bane
parantu avum kyareya nahim thaya, te to temani bandagino inkara karase ane temana satru bani jase
sum tame nathi joyum ke ame inkara karanara'o pase setanone mokali'e chi'e, je temane khuba uskere che
tame temana vise utavala na karo, ame to pote ja temana mahetalana divaso gani rahya che
je divase ame daravavala'one dayalu allaha tarapha, mahemana banavi bhega karisum
ane papi'one sakhata tarasani sthitimam jahannama tarapha hanki kadhisum
ko'ine pana bhalamanano adhikara nahim hoya, sivaya te lokona, jemane allaha ta'ala pasethi ko'i paravanagi lidhi hoya
temani vata to evi che ke dayalu allaha'e pana santana rakhyum che
ni:Sanka tame khuba ja kharaba ane atyanta bhare vastu la'i avya cho
najika che ke a vatana karane akasa phati jaya ane dharati pana phati jaya ane parvata curecura tha'i jaya
ke te'o rahamana (allaha) mate santanane sabita kare che
rahamanani sana nathi ke te santana rakhe
Akasa ane dharatimam je kami pana che badha ja allahana dasa banine ja avase
te saune tene gheravamam la'i lidha che ane sauni ganatari pana kari rakhi che
a badha ja kayamatana divase ekala teni pase hajara thase
ni:Sanka je loko imana lavya che ane je loko'e satkarmo karya che, temana mate allaha rahamana (dayalu) mohabbata nankhi dese
ame a kura'anane tamari bhasamam khuba ja sarala kari didhum che ke tame tena dvara daravavala'one khusakhabara api do ane jhaghado karanarane saceta kari do
ame a loko pahela ghana juthone nasta kari didha che, sum temana manthi ekani pana ahata tame anubhavo cho? Athava temana avajana bhanakara pana tamara kanamam pade che
